feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
